segments.text: So , where is this bus supposed to take us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should take us back up to Altadena .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , don't you know for sure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not really sure if it does or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure we got on the right bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never taken this bus , but I think it's the right one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This place doesn't look like Altadena .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true , and we have been on this bus for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Read one of the street signs or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the last time I'm trusting you with the transportation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My bad , but at least we know the right bus to take us back .
segments.speaker: S2
